goal.name: turbine:base
goal.description:
Setup the environment to start developing a Turbine base application from scratch.
You must specify the package that you want the code to be generated into, e.g.
maven -Dpackage=com.mycompany.project genapp

goal.name: turbine:sample
goal.description: Generate an simple application (like the TDK).

goal.name: turbine:inplace
goal.description: Builds an inplace exploded WAR webapp. Run this the first time to setup your inplace development. Also runs the eclipse plugin to update your .project and .classpath files. This faciliates using Eclipse and Turbine baseds apps together.

goal.name: turbine:inplace-clean
goal.description: Cleans an inplace exploded WAR webapp. Note, this deletes any files in the 'src/WEB-INF/classes' and 'src/WEB-INF/lib' directories!
